name: Pizza Pepperoni
description: Tomato sauce, extra cheese mozzarella and double pepperoni.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, cheddar, emmental and gorgonzola cheese.

name: Vegetable Pizza
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, black olives, onion, red peppers, mushrooms.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Prosciutto with onions in a cream sauce.

name: Tortellini
description: With garlic marinated mushrooms and mozzarella cheese.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: Meat sauce mixed with bechamel in the inside and grated parmigiano cheese on top.

name: Greek Salad
description: Cherry tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, green pepper and romaine lettuce.

name: Italian Pasta Salad
description: Fusili pasta, salami, cherry tomatoes, peppers and mozzarella balls.

name: Chicken Garden Salad
description: Chicken breast, romaine lettuce, purple cabbage, cherry tomatoes, radishes, limes and ranch sauce.

name: Panna Cotta
description: Milk pudding with vanilla flavour and strawberry marmalade.

name: Macaron
description: Meringue based cookie sandwich with a chocolate fill.

name: Mango Dessert
description: Mango cake with caramel and strawberry.
